::Obitus/Magmatron::

    Magmatron sent a comm to Obitus. In it were expli=
cit instructions to return to base. Obitus agreed.

::Magmatron::

    He w=
atched as the body was completed, now all it needed was the nessary program=
ming to keep it in line, and, of course, a Spark.
    Magmatron pulled a ca=
ble from his head and sealed himself in his command room, once sealed he be=
gan to program the Beast.
    (The command room is sealed, the only way to =
open the door if you aren't Magmatron is by blowing it up, and the autoguns=
 are on, any active weapons signatures will be shot.)
